module.name: fpg_button
module.short: This unit defines the push button classes.

element.name: TImageLayout
element.short: Enum type defining the position of images inside a Button

element.name: TImageLayout.ilImageLeft
element.short: Image to the left of the button text.

element.name: TImageLayout.ilImageRight
element.short: Image to the right of the button text.

element.name: TfpgBaseButton
element.short: Base class that represents a push button control

element.name: TfpgBaseButton.ImageLayout
element.short: Defines where on the button the image will be displayed

element.name: TfpgBaseButton.ImageSpacing
element.short: The spacing between the Image and the Text
element.descr: The ImageSpacing value is in pixels. The value range is from -1 to any positive value. -1 has a special meaning and is also the default value. When ImageSpacing equals -1, then the spacing between the button image and the button text is automatically calculated so that the button text is centred in the available horizontal space of the button.

element.name: TfpgBaseButton.ImageName
element.short: The registered name of a image to display on the button
element.descr: . This is the name used when a image resource was registered with the global fpgImages instance.

element.name: TfpgButton
element.short: Concrete button class used in user interfaces to represent a push button
element.descr: . This class is a descendant of TfpgBaseButton and simply publishes various properties for runtime type information.
